**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 34 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29 [Hezle](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1544) **Source** [Pathfinder #146: Cult of Cinders](/Sources.aspx?ID=7) pg. 50 **Perception** +14; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Mwangi](/Languages.aspx?ID=39) **Skills** [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +18, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +16, [Mining Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +16, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +16, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +12 **Str** -1 **Dex** +4 **Con** +2 **Int** +6 **Wis** +2 **Cha** +3 **Items** [greater antidote](/Equipment.aspx?ID=80), _+1 [crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67)_ (16 regular bolts and 4 [wyvern poisoned](/Equipment.aspx?ID=132) bolts), _+1 [dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)_, [moderate healing potions](/Equipment.aspx?ID=186) (2), infused reagents, [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), _[greater staff of fire](/Equipment.aspx?ID=356)_ --- **AC** 27 **Fort** +14 **Ref** +18 **Will** +16 **HP** 122 **Immunities** [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _dagger_ +19 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d4+2 piercing **Melee** _staff of fire_ +13 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [two-hand d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)), **Damage** 1d4–1 bludgeoning **Ranged** _crossbow_ +20 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 1d6+3 piercing (plus [wyvern poison](/Equipment.aspx?ID=132) on first four shots) **Ranged** dagger +19 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d4+2 piercing **Kobold Explosives** ([Alchemical](/Traits.aspx?ID=6), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) **Cost** 1 batch of infused reagents. **Effect** Hezle quickly cobbles together an explosive bomb and lobs it up to 30 feet. All creatures in a 5-foot burst take 5d6 fire damage (DC 26 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). **Smoky Retreat** ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Cost** 1 batch of infused reagents. **Requirements** Hezle must be adjacent to at least one enemy. **Effect** Hezle throws a mix of special powders centered on a corner of her space, creating a plume of smoke filling a 5-foot burst until the end of her turn that causes her to be [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22). She then immediately [Sneaks](/Actions.aspx?ID=63), but must end her movement in a space that's not adjacent to any enemies. All creatures other than Hezle in the smoke cloud must attempt a DC 26 Fortitude save.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature is [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34).
**Failure** The creature is sickened 2.
**Critical Failure** The creature is sickened 3 and [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36). **[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)** (precision) 2d6 **Staff Mastery** Although Hezle does not cast spells, her obsession with fire and long hours of practice allow her to cast spells from her [_staff of fire_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=356) as if she had the spells on her spell list and could cast them. She still must expend charges from the staff normally; when she prepares the staff each morning, she is capable of placing 4 charges in the staff.
name: Hezle
